attributes.action: Travelling abroad no extra private testing if fully vaccinated
attributes.additional_details: It's unfair to make people spend money on tests when they are vaccinated with both vaccines
attributes.background: If we have had both covid vaccine we should be able to travel with out paying for so many private test

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government aren't responsible for the entry requirements for other nations.
